senses.sense_definition: The quality of being based on personal feelings, tastes, or opinions rather than external facts.

examples.text: There is always an element of <w>subjectivity</w> when judging art competitions.
The <w>subjectivity</w> of his report made it difficult to determine what actually happened.

senses.sense_definition: A specific personal perspective, thought, or feeling, often regarding identity or social consciousness.

examples.text: The author explores the conflicting <w>subjectivities</w> of the characters in the novel.
Sociologists study how collective <w>subjectivities</w> are formed within different communities.
